ygData.subject: Re: Warning about Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: Level 45 - WOW!  Do you still have to be careful of stuff as you travel? Are Grif s a threat or do they con green?  Can you walk through the Gogre of Xorbb and
ygData.messageBody:
Level 45 - WOW! Do you still have to be careful of stuff as you travel?
Are Grif's a threat or do they con green? Can you walk through the Gogre of
Xorbb and have stuff run away from you? I suppose you collect evil eye's
like my 7th level collects beetle eye's? Ever stop to kill
rat's/orc's/gnoll's at the city gates any more? Just for old time's sake <g>

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: J.M. Capozzi [mailto:croak63@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 4:55 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Warning about Accelerando

From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>

At level 45 with a drum, I am a LOT faster than SoC cast by
a 47th level
Shaman. Ran a footrace in West Commons, from the Kithicor
side. I was
zoned before she got to the dervish camp, and SoC wore off
before she made
it across the zone.

It's a dead heat if I sing Accel and the shaman is using
Cheetah. Not to
mention the extremely short duration of Cheetah, the extreme
long recast
time, etc. She had to wait five minutes before we could try
it again.

Forget about SoW, you blow by them like they were walking,
and Journeyboots
like they were sneaking.

At this level, accel and drums is scary fast. Nothing, I
mean nothing, can
catch you, short of creatures that can summon.

----- Original Message -----
From: <David.Lynam@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:37 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Warning about Accelerando


>From: David.Lynam@...
>
>If that's the case, then I suppse we DO move faster as we
level, because I
>can move faster than griffawns (im one of the naughty boys
that kited them
>for a bubble at 20), and hill giants, and cyclopses, and
lions. So that's
>good news...maybe at lv 50 we can keep up with SoC eh?
>
>Ka`Lend, 24th Wood Elven Bard of Rallos Zek
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 1:24 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Warning about Accelerando
>
>
>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>On Wed, 2 Jun 1999 David.Lynam@... wrote:
>
>Lions, gators, griffins (and -ons and -awnes), and I think
>sand giants (I only lasted 5 hits against one so can't say
for
>sure) can keep up with the sung version as well.
>
>I could've sworn I was moving noticably faster when I
reached
>L15 or 16. I've been meaning to test this with a low level
>bard for a while.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>
